markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tooth Fairy Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1345)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A mob of tooth fairies working together can conduct forced dentistry in seconds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Tooth Fairy Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1345)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 273</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 28

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 2, piercing 5, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 5

**Plaque Burst** When killed, a tooth fairy swarm bursts into sticky, foul-smelling white dust. Each creature with 15 feet must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 40 feet

**Pinch** <actions string="Single Action" />  Tooth fairies pinch their victims' fingers, noses, ears, or similar protruding body parts. Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Creatures that critically fail this save are [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) from the pain.

**Pry** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The tooth fairies try to pry out one of their target's teeth. One enemy in the swarm's space takes 4d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a failed save, the target takes 2 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and a –1 status penalty to Charisma-based skill checks, and they must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to Cast a Spell with a verbal component or the spell is disrupted. The penalty and spellcasting condition last for 1 day, or until the stolen tooth is returned and the target regains at least 1 Hit Point.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-270" />
name: Tooth Fairy Swarm
